description.title: Tenscan RPC: get public transaction data after performing some transactions
description.purpose: Calls scan_getTotalTransactionCount before and after performing some transactions, then retries the first page of public transaction data via scan_getPublicTransactionData. As the txs are stored in a LIFO calls to get the first page should return a set of transactions that contain them. Test also validates on correct descending order in the txs. Note this test shouldn't be run on a network where other users are transacting.
